verses.verse: Now [this is] the enumeration <WH4557> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> the heads <WH7218> of fathers' [households,] the commanders <WH8269> of thousands <WH505> and of hundreds, <WH3967> and their officers <WH7860> who served <WH8334> the king <WH4428> in all <WH3605> the affairs <WH1697> of the divisions <WH4256> which came <WH935> in and went <WH3318> out month <WH2320> by month <WH2320> throughout all <WH3605> the months <WH2320> of the year, <WH8141> each <WH259> division <WH4256> [numbering] 24000.
Jashobeam <WH3434> the son <WH1121> of Zabdiel <WH2068> had charge <WH5921> of the first <WH7223> division <WH4256> for the first <WH7223> month; <WH2320> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
[He was] from the sons <WH1121> of Perez, <WH6557> [and was] chief <WH7218> of all <WH3605> the commanders <WH8269> of the army <WH6635> for the first <WH7223> month. <WH2320>

Dodai <WH1737> the Ahohite <WH266> and his division <WH4256> had charge <WH5921> of the division <WH4256> for the second <WH8145> month, <WH2320> Mikloth <WH4732> [being] the chief <WH5057> officer; <WH5057> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.

The third <WH7992> commander <WH8269> of the army <WH6635> for the third <WH7992> month <WH2320> [was] Benaiah, <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077> the priest, <WH3548> [as] chief; <WH7218> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.

This <WH1931> Benaiah <WH1141> [was] the mighty <WH1368> man <WH1368> of the thirty, <WH7970> and had charge <WH5921> of thirty; <WH7970> and over his division <WH4256> was Ammizabad <WH5990> his son. <WH1121>

The fourth <WH7243> for the fourth <WH7243> month <WH2320> [was] Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> and Zebadiah <WH2069> his son <WH1121> after <WH310> him; and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The fifth <WH2549> for the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320> [was] the commander <WH8269> Shamhuth <WH8049> the Izrahite; <WH3155> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The sixth <WH8345> for the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320> [was] Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite; <WH8621> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The seventh <WH7637> for the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> [was] Helez <WH2503> the Pelonite <WH6397> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim; <WH669> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The eighth <WH8066> for the eighth <WH8066> month <WH2320> [was] Sibbecai <WH5444> the Hushathite <WH2843> of the Zerahites; <WH2227> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The ninth <WH8671> for the ninth <WH8671> month <WH2320> [was] Abiezer <WH44> the Anathothite <WH6069> of the Benjamites; <WH1145> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The tenth <WH6224> for the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2320> [was] Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite <WH5200> of the Zerahites; <WH2227> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.

The eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> for the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> month <WH2320> [was] Benaiah <WH1141> the Pirathonite <WH6553> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim; <WH669> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.
The twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> for the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> month <WH2320> [was] Heldai <WH2469> the Netophathite <WH5200> of Othniel; <WH6274> and in his division <WH4256> [were] 24000.

Now in charge <WH5921> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel: <WH3478> chief <WH5057> officer <WH5057> for the Reubenites <WH7206> was Eliezer <WH461> the son <WH1121> of Zichri; <WH2147> for the Simeonites, <WH8099> Shephatiah <WH8203> the son <WH1121> of Maacah; <WH4601>
for Levi, <WH3878> Hashabiah <WH2811> the son <WH1121> of Kemuel; <WH7055> for Aaron, <WH175> Zadok; <WH6659>
for Judah, <WH3063> Elihu, <WH453> [one] of David's brothers; <WH251> for Issachar, <WH3485> Omri <WH6018> the son <WH1121> of Michael; <WH4317>
for Zebulun, <WH2074> Ishmaiah <WH3460> the son <WH1121> of Obadiah; <WH5662> for Naphtali, <WH5321> Jeremoth <WH3406> the son <WH1121> of Azriel; <WH5837>
for the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim, <WH669> Hoshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Azaziah; <WH5812> for the half-tribe of Manasseh, <WH4519> Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Pedaiah; <WH6305>
for the half-tribe of Manasseh <WH4519> in Gilead, <WH1568> Iddo <WH3035> the son <WH1121> of Zechariah; <WH2148> for Benjamin, <WH1144> Jaasiel <WH3300> the son <WH1121> of Abner; <WH74>
for Dan, <WH1835> Azarel <WH5832> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham. <WH3395> These <WH428> [were] the princes <WH8269> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel. <WH3478>

But David <WH1732> did not count <WH5375> <WH4557> those twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> of age <WH1121> and under, <WH4295> because <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> had said <WH559> He would multiply <WH7235> Israel <WH3478> as the stars <WH3556> of heaven. <WH8064>

Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870> had begun <WH2490> to count <WH4487> [them,] but did not finish; <WH3615> and because of this, <WH2088> wrath <WH7110> came <WH1961> upon Israel, <WH3478> and the number <WH4557> was not included <WH5927> in the account <WH1697> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of King <WH4428> David. <WH1732>

Now Azmaveth <WH5820> the son <WH1121> of Adiel <WH5717> had charge <WH5921> of the king's storehouses. <WH214> And Jonathan <WH3083> the son <WH1121> of Uzziah <WH5818> had charge <WH5921> of the storehouses <WH214> in the country, <WH7704> in the cities, <WH5892> in the villages, <WH3723> and in the towers. <WH4026>
And Ezri <WH5836> the son <WH1121> of Chelub <WH3620> had charge <WH5921> of the agricultural <WH7704> workers <WH4399> who tilled <WH5656> the soil. <WH127>

And Shimei <WH8096> the Ramathite <WH7435> had charge <WH5921> of the vineyards; <WH3754> and Zabdi <WH2067> the Shiphmite <WH8225> had charge <WH5921> of the produce of the vineyards <WH3754> [stored] in the wine <WH3196> cellars. <WH214>

And Baal-hanan the Gederite <WH1451> had charge <WH5921> of the olive <WH2132> and sycamore <WH8256> trees <WH8256> in the Shephelah; <WH8219> and Joash <WH3135> had charge <WH5921> of the stores <WH214> of oil. <WH8081>

And Shitrai <WH7861> the Sharonite <WH8290> had charge <WH5921> of the cattle <WH1241> which were grazing <WH7462> in Sharon; <WH8289> and Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Adlai <WH5724> had charge <WH5921> of the cattle <WH1241> in the valleys. <WH6010>
And Obil <WH179> the Ishmaelite <WH3459> had charge <WH5921> of the camels; <WH1581> and Jehdeiah <WH3165> the Meronothite <WH4824> had charge <WH5921> of the donkeys. <WH860>

And Jaziz <WH3151> the Hagrite <WH1905> had charge <WH5921> of the flocks. <WH6629> All <WH3605> these <WH428> were overseers <WH8269> of the property <WH7399> which <WH834> belonged to King <WH4428> David. <WH1732>

Also Jonathan, <WH3083> David's uncle, <WH1730> [was] a counselor, <WH3289> a man <WH376> of understanding, <WH995> and a scribe; <WH9373> and Jehiel <WH3171> the son <WH1121> of Hachmoni <WH2453> tutored <WH5973> the king's sons. <WH1121>
And Ahithophel <WH302> was counselor <WH3289> to the king; <WH4428> and Hushai <WH2365> the Archite <WH757> was the king's friend. <WH7453>
And Jehoiada <WH3077> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah, <WH1141> and Abiathar <WH54> succeeded <WH310> Ahithophel; <WH302> and Joab <WH3097> was the commander <WH8269> of the king's army. <WH6635>
